# LLMs.txt - Carlos Martinez Tuanama Journal

## Core Stack

**Astro 5.x** - https://docs.astro.build/
- Static site generator with content collections
- MDX support for rich content
- Image optimization built-in

**Key Patterns Used:**
- Content Collections with glob loader
- Dynamic routing via `[...slug].astro`
- Scoped CSS in `.astro` components

## Content System

**Schema** (`src/content.config.ts`):
```typescript
{
  title: string,           // Required
  description: string,     // Required
  pubDate: Date,          // Required
  author: string,         // Default: "Carlos Martinez Tuanama"
  updatedDate?: Date,     // Optional
  heroImage?: ImageMetadata, // Optional
  slug?: string           // Optional URL override
}
```

**URL Resolution:**
1. Frontmatter `slug` if present
2. Filename (without .md/.mdx)
3. Folder name for `index.md` files

## Deployment

GitHub Pages via GitHub Actions.

**Workflow:** `.github/workflows/deploy.yml`
- Triggers on push to `main`
- Builds with `npm run build`
- Deploys to GitHub Pages

**Live URL:** https://carlosmartinezt.com

## No External APIs

This is a fully static site with no runtime dependencies or external API calls.
